page.title: 08Religion in Rhos
page.content: There are an unusual amount of churches and chapels in such a small village as Rhos.There are 5 churches and 19 chapels.The majority of people in Rhos attend chapel.Most of the chapels were built at the turn of the century between 1905 and 1910.Rhos was part of the parish of Ruabon but the population grew immensely in the middle of the 18th century so the people of Rhos decided to make a separate parish.The Rhos parish church was built in 1853.Our school is a 'controlled' school.That is it has financial help from the parish church. It also serves the local people in baptisims,marriages,funerals,and a variety of services. School links: 1.We use the church for our Christmas carol services. 2.Some of the Governors who run the school belong to the Church of Wales.
